name: Stick Over It
description:
Stick Over It is a punishing climbing platformer game with the purpose on reaching the top of the neon castle.

It is inspired by games like Getting Over It, Pogostuck and Jump King, where if you fall you lose some progress, but there are also some obstacles that can kill instantly, so be careful of them!

___

Operating Systems:

  • Windows 32 / 64
  • Linux 32 / 64
  • Mac 64

___

Music by Teknoaxe

Thank you for visiting, and for those who enjoyed this page enough to buy it, I appreciate the support and I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed creating and testing it!
